name: Spirit Isle
description:
Didn't really get a change to finish before it was over, but I think it has potential. Most of the stuff is placeholder, especially on the sound side. Technically works with M&KB, but it will be painful without a controller.

Controls:

A/ Right Mouse: Attack  

Left Bumper/ Space: Dash

Left Trigger (hold)/ q: L Target

No menus at all right now, so alt f4 to quit

Edit 4/7 23:50: Music/ some sfx seem to be broken in the builds, working on a fix
